column4: i've had great success with World of Warcraft using Transgaming's 'Cedega'
results vary across systems, but on mine vanilla wine from ubuntu repos was great
i ran it on a system with two 2ghz xeons, 512mb ram, and a 128mb video card pretty well with plain 'ol wine.   i was impressed.   i'm still a fan of cedega's game-specific settings though.
and i just got bored of wow
